dependencies.name: transposit/slack:v2.*.*
dependencies.title: Slack
dependencies.description: Authorize this connector if you want to use the Slack API.

tql.tql:
-- This SQL operation is useful to test the message you've
-- constructed for your webhook. If you provide a Slack
-- auth in "Auth & user settings", it will post a message
-- to your Slackbot channel.
SELECT * FROM slack.post_chat_message AS A
JOIN this.get_slack_message AS B
ON A.$body.blocks = B.blocks
AND A.$body.text = B.text
WHERE A.$body.channel = (SELECT user_id from slack.test_auth)

SELECT * FROM aws_s3.list_objects_v2
  WHERE Bucket=@bucket_name
  AND prefix=@log_path
  AND Size > 0
  limit 2 -- for testing

SELECT * FROM aws_s3.get_object
  WHERE Bucket='mooreds-cloudtrail'
  AND Key='AWSLogs/425414788231/CloudTrail/us-east-2/2019/10/08/425414788231_CloudTrail_us-east-2_20191008T0250Z_A3fA0ZBQgkhsIIXO.json.gz'

SELECT Key
FROM (SELECT *
  FROM aws_s3.list_objects_v2
  WHERE Bucket='mooreds-cloudtrail'
     AND prefix = 'AWSLogs/425414788231/CloudTrail/us-east-2/') 
WHERE Key != 'AWSLogs/425414788231/CloudTrail/us-east-2/2019/10/08/425414788231_CloudTrail_us-east-2_20191008T0250Z_A3fA0ZBQgkhsIIXO.json.gz'

SELECT country_code FROM ipstack.getPhysicalAddressFromIP
  WHERE ipaddress=@ipaddress

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://www.transposit.com/docs/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

SELECT * FROM aws_s3.put_object
  WHERE Bucket='<required_string>'
  AND Key='<required_string>'
  AND x-amz-acl='private | public-read | public-read-write | authenticated-read | aws-exec-read | bucket-owner-read | bucket-owner-full-control'
  AND Cache-Control='<string>'
  AND Content-Disposition='<string>'
  AND Content-Encoding='<string>'
  AND Content-Language='<string>'
  AND Content-Length=<number>
  AND Content-MD5='<string>'
  AND Content-Type='<string>'
  AND Expires='<timestamp>'
  AND x-amz-grant-full-control='<string>'
  AND x-amz-grant-read='<string>'
  AND x-amz-grant-read-acp='<string>'
  AND x-amz-grant-write-acp='<string>'
  AND x-amz-meta-=(SELECT {
    '<string>' : '<string>'
  })
  AND x-amz-server-side-encryption='AES256 | aws:kms'
  AND x-amz-storage-class='STANDARD | REDUCED_REDUNDANCY | STANDARD_IA | ONEZONE_IA'
  AND x-amz-website-redirect-location='<string>'
  AND x-amz-server-side-encryption-customer-algorithm='<string>'
  AND x-amz-server-side-encryption-customer-key='<string>'
  AND x-amz-server-side-encryption-customer-key-MD5='<string>'
  AND x-amz-server-side-encryption-aws-kms-key-id='<string>'
  AND x-amz-request-payer='requester'
  AND x-amz-tagging='<string>'
  AND $body=''

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://www.transposit.com/docs/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

dataConnections.title: Slack
dataConnections.description: Used to identify you on Slack
